TEXT.English: Grants access to Creation spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_GROWTH]Growth[\LINK]. This resource counts as a health resource.
TEXT.French: Grants access to Creation spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_GROWTH]Growth[\LINK]. This resource counts as a health resource.
TEXT.German: Grants access to Creation spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_GROWTH]Growth[\LINK]. This resource counts as a health resource.
TEXT.Italian: Grants access to Creation spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_GROWTH]Growth[\LINK]. This resource counts as a health resource.
TEXT.Spanish: Da acceso a los hechizos de Creación. Esto permite a los Adeptos lanzar [LINK=SPELL_GROWTH]Crecimiento[\LINK]. Este recurso cuenta como uno de salud.

TEXT.English: Grants access to Dimensional spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_ESCAPE]Escape[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Grants access to Dimensional spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_ESCAPE]Escape[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Grants access to Dimensional spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_ESCAPE]Escape[\LINK].
TEXT.Italian: Grants access to Dimensional spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_ESCAPE]Escape[\LINK].
TEXT.Spanish: Da acceso a los hechizos Dimensionales. Permite a los Adeptos lanzar [LINK=SPELL_ESCAPE]Escapar[\LINK].

TEXT.English: Grants access to Force spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_TEMPERANCE]Temperance[\LINK]. Owning this resource will lower maintenance in all cities.
TEXT.French: Grants access to Force spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_TEMPERANCE]Temperance[\LINK]. Owning this resource will lower maintenance in all cities.
TEXT.German: Grants access to Force spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_TEMPERANCE]Temperance[\LINK]. Owning this resource will lower maintenance in all cities.
TEXT.Italian: Grants access to Force spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_TEMPERANCE]Temperance[\LINK]. Owning this resource will lower maintenance in all cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Da acceso a los hechizos de Fuerza. Esto permitirá a los Adeptos lanzar [LINK=SPELL_TEMPERANCE]Templanza[\LINK]. Poseer este recurso reducirá los costes de mantenimiento en todas las ciudades.

TEXT.English: Grants access to Ice spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_SLOW]Slow[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Grants access to Ice spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_SLOW]Slow[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Grants access to Ice spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_SLOW]Slow[\LINK].
TEXT.Italian: Grants access to Ice spells. This will allow Adepts to cast [LINK=SPELL_SLOW]Slow[\LINK].
TEXT.Spanish: Permite el acceso a los hechizos de Hielo. Esto permite a los Adeptos lanzar [LINK=SPELL_SLOW]Ralentizar[\LINK].
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la producción de unidades vivas

TEXT.English: Blessing creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. Living units are produced faster in a city with a Blessing, and they start with the Strong promotion. It also opens a specialist slot for all specialist types.
TEXT.French: Blessing creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. Living units are produced faster in a city with a Blessing, and they start with the Strong promotion. It also opens a specialist slot for all specialist types.
TEXT.German: Blessing creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. Living units are produced faster in a city with a Blessing, and they start with the Strong promotion. It also opens a specialist slot for all specialist types.
TEXT.Italian: Blessing creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. Living units are produced faster in a city with a Blessing, and they start with the Strong promotion. It also opens a specialist slot for all specialist types.
TEXT.Spanish: Bendición crea un efecto temporal (representado como un edificio) en la ciudad que permanece hasta que el lanzador se marcha. Las unidades vivas se producen mas rápidamente en las ciudades que tengan una Bendición, y comienzan con la promoción Fuerte. También abre un espacio de especialista para todos los tipos de especialistas.

TEXT.English: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering small food and culture bonuses.
TEXT.French: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering small food and culture bonuses.
TEXT.German: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering small food and culture bonuses.
TEXT.Italian: Growth creates a temporary effect (represented as a building) in the city which remains until the caster leaves. It increases the amount of food kept upon population growth as well as offering small food and culture bonuses.
TEXT.Spanish: Crecimiento crea un efecto temporal (representado como un edificio) en la ciudad que permanece hasta que el lanzador se marcha. Incrementa la cantidad de comida conservada después de un crecimiento de la población, y también proporciona una pequeña cantidad de comida y cultura.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain, Animal, Sea and Camp resources to a different resource type of the same group
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain, Animal, Sea and Camp resources to a different resource type of the same group
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain, Animal, Sea and Camp resources to a different resource type of the same group
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Converts Grain, Animal, Sea and Camp resources to a different resource type of the same group
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Convierte recursos de grano, animales, mar o campamento a un tipo de recurso diferente del mismo grupo

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Runewyns can cast [LINK=SPELL_DISPEL_MAGIC]Dispel Magic[\LINK] as well as [LINK=SPELL_UNSUMMON]Unsummon[\LINK], and they always choose to target arcane units when they attack.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Runewyns can cast [LINK=SPELL_DISPEL_MAGIC]Dispel Magic[\LINK] as well as [LINK=SPELL_UNSUMMON]Unsummon[\LINK], and they always choose to target arcane units when they attack.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Runewyns can cast [LINK=SPELL_DISPEL_MAGIC]Dispel Magic[\LINK] as well as [LINK=SPELL_UNSUMMON]Unsummon[\LINK], and they always choose to target arcane units when they attack.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Runewyns can cast [LINK=SPELL_DISPEL_MAGIC]Dispel Magic[\LINK] as well as [LINK=SPELL_UNSUMMON]Unsummon[\LINK], and they always choose to target arcane units when they attack.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Los Runewyns pueden lanzar [LINK=SPELL_DISPEL_MAGIC]Disipar Magia[\LINK] y [LINK=SPELL_UNSUMMON]Desconvocar[\LINK], y siempre eligen como objetivo a unidades arcanas cuando atacan.

TEXT.English: Runewyns are winged angels of Dagda who are immune to all magic. They are frequently sent to battle powerful wizards or to cross magical barriers. They can drain away all but the most powerful spells with a touch.
TEXT.French: Runewyns are winged angels of Dagda who are immune to all magic. They are frequently sent to battle powerful wizards or to cross magical barriers. They can drain away all but the most powerful spells with a touch.
TEXT.German: Runewyns are winged angels of Dagda who are immune to all magic. They are frequently sent to battle powerful wizards or to cross magical barriers. They can drain away all but the most powerful spells with a touch.
TEXT.Italian: Runewyns are winged angels of Dagda who are immune to all magic. They are frequently sent to battle powerful wizards or to cross magical barriers. They can drain away all but the most powerful spells with a touch.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Runewyns son ángeles alados de Dagda inmunes a todo tipo de magia. Son frecuentemente enviados a luchar contra poderosos magos o a cruzar barreras mágicas. Pueden eliminar todos los hechizos salvo los más poderosos con un mero toque.
